name.ja: <ruby>蒼<rt>そう</rt></ruby><ruby>救<rt>きゅう</rt></ruby>の<ruby>閃<rt>せん</rt></ruby><ruby>光<rt>こう</rt></ruby> ソルシュエール

requirement.en: Place 1 other card from your field on the bottom of the owner's Deck.

effect.en:
● Destroy Spell/Trap Cards on your opponent's field, up to [the number of face-up Celestial Warrior Type monsters on your field].
● Add 1 "Skysavior Symbol" from your Graveyard to your hand.

materials.en: "Ciela the Skysavior Knight" + "Soleil the Skysavior Angel"

ja.set_name: Deck Mod Pack: Double Star of the Assault!!
